channel.title: Game Crash - On A Rail
channel.description: Hi guys, Firstly, great work on the game. Its excellent and I am really enjoying playing through single player. Up until the point I mention below the game runs virtually flawlessly for me. There are a few issues (stuck Vortigaunts etc.) but nothing major. After launching the satellite missile during "on a rail" I get on to the yellow freight transport and start to move forward. As soon as the "Loading" screen appears the game exits and spits me back to the desktop meaning that I am unable to progress any further. I have tried to move forward through the tunnel both on the freight transport and by walking, as soon as the loading screen appears the game crashes (exits without warning). I have attached the dump file created which will hopefully help you guys track down the issue (had to zip it as the forum up-loader moaned about the .dmp extension) The following might be helpful? * This happens every time consistently * It's the most recent steam version (as of 14.05.15) * PC specs are - AMD Phenom 2 X6 1055T processor 2.80Ghz, 8GB RAM, AMD 7970 GPU, Windows 7 64-bit * * Apologies if this has been posted before but I have done a search and didn't see it. As far as bugs go its a show-stopper. Thanks, Mrrnoname crash_bms.exe_20150514175848_1.zip (33.3 KB)

item.title: Game Crash - On A Rail
item.dc:creator: Mrrnoname
item.description:
Hi guys,

Firstly, great work on the game. Its excellent and I am really enjoying playing through single player. Up until the point I mention below the game runs virtually flawlessly for me. There are a few issues (stuck Vortigaunts etc.) but nothing major.

After launching the satellite missile during “on a rail” I get on to the yellow freight transport and start to move forward. As soon as the “Loading” screen appears the game exits and spits me back to the desktop meaning that I am unable to progress any further. I have tried to move forward through the tunnel both on the freight transport and by walking, as soon as the loading screen appears the game crashes (exits without warning). I have attached the dump file created which will hopefully help you guys track down the issue (had to zip it as the forum up-loader moaned about the .dmp extension)

The following might be helpful?

  • This happens every time consistently
  • It’s the most recent steam version (as of 14.05.15)
  • PC specs are - AMD Phenom 2 X6 1055T processor 2.80Ghz, 8GB RAM, AMD 7970 GPU, Windows 7 64-bit

Apologies if this has been posted before but I have done a search and didn’t see it. As far as bugs go its a show-stopper.

Thanks,
Mrrnoname
